statements: SELECT * FROM machines
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, installation_date FROM machines ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT machine_id, machine_name FROM machines WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT machine_name, location_id FROM machines WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01'
SELECT machine_id, machine_name FROM machines WHERE location_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT machine_name, installation_date FROM machines WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, installation_date FROM machines WHERE machine_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001');
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(machine_id) AS total_machines, location_id FROM machines GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(machine_id) >= 2 ORDER BY total_machines DESC;
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT machine_name, location FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM machine_data WHERE temperature > 50 AND vibration < 0.5;
SELECT machine_name, location, status FROM machines WHERE location LIKE '%floor%';
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM machine_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_name, location, status FROM machines WHERE machine_id = 1
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE location = 'Factory A'
SELECT machine_name, temperature, pressure FROM machines JOIN machine_data ON machines.machine_id = machine_data.machine_id WHERE temperature > 100
SELECT machine_name, timestamp FROM machines JOIN machine_data ON machines.machine_id = machine_data.machine_id WHERE pressure > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC

SELECT machine_name, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(pressure) AS avg_pressure FROM machines JOIN machine_data ON machines.machine_id = machine_data.machine_id GROUP BY machine_name HAVING avg_temp > 90
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 100;
SELECT machine_name, timestamp, production_output FROM machines JOIN production_logs ON machines.machine_id = production_logs.machine_id;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_sensor_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name ASC;
SELECT machine_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM machines WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value < 50 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT machine_name, production_output FROM machines JOIN production_logs ON machines.machine_id = production_logs.machine_id WHERE production_output > 100 ORDER BY production_output DESC;
SELECT * FROM machines WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' OR sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM machines ORDER BY machine_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE machine_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM machines;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_type DESC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location FROM machines WHERE location='Factory A';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';

SELECT sensors.sensor_id, sensors.sensor_type, sensor_data.timestamp, sensor_data.value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY sensor_data.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Machines;
SELECT machine_name, location FROM Machines ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location FROM Sensors WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_name, location, production_capacity FROM Machines WHERE production_capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Machines WHERE production_capacity > 100 ORDER BY machine_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT machine_name, location, production_capacity FROM Machines WHERE location = 'Factory A' ORDER BY production_capacity ASC;
SELECT machine_id, machine_name, location, production_capacity FROM Machines JOIN Sensors ON Machines.machine_id = Sensors.machine_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_location = 'Room 1';
SELECT sensor_id, data_time, data_value FROM SensorData WHERE data_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY data_time DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT PerformanceMetrics.machine_id, metric_date, downtime_seconds, efficiency_percent, machine_name FROM PerformanceMetrics JOIN Machines ON PerformanceMetrics.machine_id = Machines.machine_id WHERE efficiency_percent < 90 ORDER BY downtime_seconds DESC LIMIT 5;
